message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $85. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82.50? I think that's a fair price for both of us.

Hi Bob, I understand you're still looking for a better deal, and I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell the product to you for $84. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a great value for the product.

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $82? I think that's the best we can both get out of this deal.
